oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: WSM Variety Award Presentation - 1949-06-01 (copy) - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program aimed at George Rosen of Variety magazine to celebrate winning the 1948 Variety Award for 'How To Run A Radio Station'. Part one of four, this part introduces the show and looks at WSM's staff orchestra and vocalists. This disc is a duplicate of TR001246_1.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Beasley Smith; Lion Orchestra; Owen Bradley; Skyriders; Snooky Lanson; Dixie Dons; Fred Waller; Dottie Dillard; Bob Johnstone; Anne Rupert; Bob Lamb; Dolores Watson; Joseph MacPherson; Alcyone Bate Beasley; Jack Shook; Claude Sharpe
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: WSM receptionist transfers a call from George Rosen to Jack Stapp (reenactment) -- Jack Stapp receives the news that WSM has won the Variety Award for 'How To Run A Radio Station' (reenactment) -- Announcer talks about the winning of the Variety Award -- Great Day (excerpt) (Beasley Smith and the Lion Orchestra) -- Announcer talks about the WSM staff band -- [Unidentified musical excerpt] (Owen Bradley and the Skyriders) -- Announcer introduces the WSM conductors Beasley Smith, Owen Bradley, and Harold Johnson -- Especially For You [title unconfirmed] (excerpt) (Owen Bradley) -- [Unidentified musical excerpt] -- Announcer introduces Snooky Lanson -- While My Lady Sleeps (excerpt) (Snooky Lanson) -- Announcer introduces the Dixie Dons -- If You Stub Your Toe On The Moon (excerpt) (The Dixie Dons) -- Announcer introduces Fred Waller -- Do You Still Love Me (excerpt) (Fred Waller) -- Announcer introduces Dottie Dillard -- Put Your Shoes On, Lucy (excerpt) (Dottie Dillard) -- Announcer introduces Bob Johnstone -- Alone Together (excerpt) (Bob Johnstone) -- Announcer introduces Anne Rupert -- Bewitched, Bothered And Bewildered (excerpt) (Anne Rupert) -- Announcer introduces Bob Lamb -- Beg Your Pardon (excerpt) (Bob Lamb) -- Announcer introduces Dolores Watson -- Someone To Love (excerpt) (Dolores Watson) -- Announcer introduces Joseph MacPherson -- (It's Gonna Be) A Great Day (excerpt) (Joseph MacPherson) -- Announcer introduces Alcyone Bate Beasley -- Baby Your Mother (Like She Babied You) (excerpt) (Alcyone Bate Beasley) -- Announcer introduces Jack Shook -- My Hillside Heaven (excerpt) (Jack Shook) -- Announcer introduces Claude Sharpe -- The Green Hills Of Ireland (excerpt) (Claude Sharpe)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Stapp, Jack, 1912-1980; Smith, Beasley; Lion Orchestra (Musical group); Bradley, Owen; Skyriders (Musical group); Johnson, Harold (Musician); Nashville Symphony Orchestra; Lanson, Snooky; Dixie Dons (Musical group); Waller, Fred (Vocalist); Dillard, Dottie; Johnstone, Bob (Vocalist); Lamb, Bob (Vocalist); Watson, Dolores; McPherson, Joseph (Musician); Beasley, Alcyone; Shook, Jack; Sharpe, Claude, 1902-1969
